name: Half-Life 2 RTX
summary: Re-live the groundbreaking, critically acclaimed Half-Life 2 like never before, reimagined with RTX Remix. Featuring full ray tracing, remastered assets, and DLSS 3.5 with Ray Reconstruction in this free DLC for Half-Life 2 owners.
